```{r include=FALSE}
library(caret)
library(tidymodels)
library(doParallel)
library(DataExplorer)
library(knitr)
set.seed(1017)
# Import data
df = readRDS("/Users/timvigers/Documents/Work/BDC/Howard Davidson/R01/Data_Raw/subset_data.rds")
df = df$env$data
```

# Methods

```{r}
# Base recipes
cpep_recipe <- recipe(cpep_model_decayrate ~ ., data = df)
```

```{r echo=FALSE,eval=FALSE}
# EDA
eda = prep(cpep_recipe,df)
eda = bake(eda,new_data = df)
eda %>%
    create_report(
        output_file = "EDA.html",
        output_dir = "~/Documents/Work/BDC/Howard Davidson/R01/Reports",
        report_title = "Exploratory Data Analysis",
        y = "cpep_model_decayrate"
    )
```
